meanings.definition: A work of art consisting of two panels hinged together.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a beautiful diptyca showcasing two different scenes.
meanings.sent2: She bought a diptyca of landscapes to hang in her living room.
meanings.sent3: The artist painted a diptyca of a cat on one panel and a dog on the other, creating a playful contrast.
meanings.sent4: The diptyca of emotions in her eyes and smile revealed a complex inner world.
meanings.sent5: The diptyca of the sunrise and sunset was a stunning representation of day and night.

meanings.definition: A set of two paintings or photographs intended to be displayed together.
meanings.sent1: The gallery featured a diptyca of black and white photographs capturing urban life.
meanings.sent2: He gifted her a diptyca of abstract paintings for her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The diptyca of flowers on one canvas and bees on the other brought a touch of nature indoors.
meanings.sent4: The diptyca of memories frozen in time hung on the wall, telling a silent story.
meanings.sent5: The diptyca of the city skyline at day and night was a striking contrast in perspective.

meanings.definition: A pair of connected literary works.
meanings.sent1: The author's diptyca explored themes of love and loss in two intertwined novels.
meanings.sent2: Students analyzed a diptyca of poems by the same poet to understand their evolution.
meanings.sent3: The diptyca of mystery novels kept readers guessing until the very end.
meanings.sent4: Her diptyca of short stories painted vivid pictures of everyday life.
meanings.sent5: The diptyca of fantasy novels transported readers to magical realms beyond imagination.
